snippet: LEAD: When first proposed, a sweeping California ballot measure that promised a ''bold and comprehensive'' plan to protect the environment seemed a sure winner that could deliver a powerful national message about the public's determination to figh...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: When first proposed, a sweeping California ballot measure that promised a ''bold and comprehensive'' plan to protect the environment seemed a sure winner that could deliver a powerful national message about the public's determination to fight pollution.

headline.main: Once Considered a Sure Thing, California's Environmental Package Falters

byline.original: By ROBERT REINHOLD, Special to The New York Times
